description: This is a set of utilities for reading and manipulating PIO files written in python and C++. These files are intended to be building blocks for other scripts / programs that will use them to do great things. The PIO format itself is described in LA-UR-05-7425 at page 102 and embodied in code LA-CC-05-052. In addition to reading the raw PIO files, the bundled utilities will expand variable that use a compressed sparse row notation
name: PIO Tools
